problem.markdown:
>>What does alcazar mean?<< ( ) headache relief ( ) captive (x) fortress or castle ( ) vegetable peeler
[explanation] In Spain, many places have alcazars. The word comes from the Arabic "Al-Qasr" (I think). [explanation]

div.p: In Spain, many places have alcazars. The word comes from the Arabic "Al-Qasr" (I think).
